text:
what version of npm, node, and hs do you have?
`npm --version`
`node --version`
`hs --version`

_Node v23.6.0_
_npm 10.9.2_
_HS 7.0.1_

The node and npm were updated yesterday while I was trying to fix thisâ€¦.

I logged the debug of `hs init --debug` to a file so I saw an error around SSL certificates.

Eventually, after much digging, I had to run `export NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS="/opt/homebrew/etc/ca-certificates/cert.pem"`to get it work. Still not clear where the issue is, but at least now I know where to start looking from
